body.name: CUTELULY Video Camera Camcorder,HD 1080P 30FPS 36MP 270°Degree Rotation,16X Zoom Digital Camera, Night Vision Vlogging Camera for YouTube with External Microphone,Lens Hood, Remote Control, Stabilizer
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 2 hrs 44 mins
features: 【Multifunction Camera】Video camera camcorder boasts stunning video and image quality, with HD 30FPS (1920×1080) video resolution and 36MP (7936×4480) image resolution. The 3.0-inch LCD touch screen and 270° rotation allow for easy angle adjustments, with 16X digital zoom, you can capture every detail from afar. Whether it's a family occasion, a vacation, or an adventure, our video camera enables you to bring your memories to life with exceptional video and image quality.

【IR Night Vision & Recording While Charging】 The video camcorder has the function of IR night vision and working while charging, it can work perfectly in dark environments, you can use the camera while charging, no need to worry about battery power consumption. You can capture your daily life, travel or adventure in low light conditions and share it with your friends.

【External Microphone and Remote Control】 The digital video camera is equipped with an X-Y stereo external microphone to reduce noise, improve audio and video quality, and make the video sound clear and stable. The remote control can control the camera remotely, and can take videos and photos within a range of 16 feet/5 meters.

【Handheld Stabilizer and Hood】 The stabilizer can fix the camera and keep the camera stable when taking pictures or recording videos, so that the videos and pictures are clear, smooth and stable. The hood can filter out excess light and make the picture more clear and perfect. The camera supports 4-128GB external memory card (not included) and standard tripod (not included).

【Webcam Function】 This camera is equipped with HDMI cable and USB cable, not only can connect the camera to TV to play videos and photos through HDMI cable, but also can be used as a webcam, connected to computer through USB data cable,suitable for video calls and live broadcasts, when it is connected to the PC, select PC camera and press OK to complete the setup . Whether you're shooting a short film or documenting your travels, a video camera is a great tool.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Why should you choose CUTELULY video camera camcorder? （1）Supports 1080P video resolution, 36MP image resolution and 16X digital zoom （2）Comes with external microphone, lens hood, foldable handheld stabilizer and remote control. （3）3.0 inch 270° rotation touch screen （4）2 in 1 Camcorder: Video camera can be used as a webcam. （5）Pause Function: Pause or resume recording under the same file. （6）Recording while charging without worrying about running out of battery power. （7）Multiffunction such as IR night vision, time lapse, slow motion, beauty function, self-timer, anti-shake, smile capture, auto power off, TV output, 12 languages for choose and so on. （8）Supports SD card up to 128GB and tripod (No included in package).

Webcam capability and HDMI output CUTELULY YouTube 1080P camera can be used as a webcam for live broadcasting on social media, and is also very suitable for video calling with family and friends in daily life. This camcorder supports TV output, you can connect the camcorder to a TV, and share the wonderful pictures and videos you capture in your travels and life with your family and friends.

The 1080p camera is equipped with a 3.0-inch IPS 270-degree rotating touch screen, which can be easily adjusted according to the desired shooting angle. The touch screen allows you to experience different shooting fun. The digital video camera is equipped with an X-Y stereo external microphone, which can reduce noise, improve audio and video quality, and make the video sound clear and stable. The remote control can control the camera remotely, and can take videos and photos within a range of 16ft/5m. The camera has infrared night vision and digital zoom, it can work perfectly in dark environment, 16x digital zoom allows you to capture every detail from a distance. Whether it's a family gathering, vacation or adventure, our cameras bring your memories to life with exceptional video and image quality.

The camera has the function of recording while charging, you can use the camera while charging, even if you need to record for a long time, you don't need to worry about the battery power consumption. You can use a power bank (not included) to charge the camera during outdoor picnic trips The camcorder has a UHD 1080P lens configuration. It can support 36MP image resolution and 30FPS resolution, providing you with clearer, natural, beautiful color images and videos Videos that capture beautiful moments are even better. With the pause function, you will never miss a moment. You can pause a video recording and resume shooting without starting a new video recording.

Notice: （1）Power off camera before replace memory card. （2）This camera is an amateur camera and not intended for professional users. （3）Memory card （SD card is not included in the package）needs to be formatted for first time use or if the card was used by other camera. （4）If the video camera crashes or shows a blurred screen, please format the SD card (not included) with a computer before using it. （5）Due to compatibility issues, we do not recommend using other brands of external microphones.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great solution for recording kids sporting events and not killing your phones battery
reviews.reviewText: My daughter plays basketball and sometimes we are at the events all day. I used to use my iPhone and would end up with either end up with dead battery or had to charge a ton of charging blocks . I remember how I used to use video cameras and decided to look on Amazon. I located this camera and couldn’t believe how affordable they are. I decided to order and received the. Andra the. Ext day which was great cause my daughter had a basketball game that night. The video camera was nice and small and felt very well made and it was great to not have to stress out about my phone battery. The camera captured the images in excellent quality and the included microphone picked up the action of the game but not a lot of background noise . I live the pull out screen so you can actually see what you are recording as you go along. I also was take some still shots that came out great. Super happy with purchase

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Beginner Camera
reviews.reviewText: Unboxing:The camera came with extra batteries for both the camera and the remote, a thoughtful touch. It included all necessary cabling and a complimentary microphone. Add your own memory card and it's ready to go.Testing:In well-lit environments, the camera's sensor performs admirably, but it struggles in dim areas. Unfortunately, the microphone's signal-to-noise ratio is notably poor, rendering it essentially unusable. Camera controls were not entirely intuitive but easy enough to figure out. The infrared (IR) capability emerged as a standout feature.Final Thoughts:This camera for hobby use excels in niche scenarios like recreating early 2000s aesthetics or venturing into low-light environments for some spooky cinematography with IR or simple recording. A great tool for a novice videographer, it proves to be an enjoyable and functional camera for specific, lighthearted purposes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice camera with lots of extras.
reviews.reviewText: Compact camera that is very easy to use. Comes with a lot of extras. Boom microphone. Extension handle to film from all angles. Two camera batteries, charger, cables for video transfer and a remote (with an extra battery. 3 inch screen with different modes for filming. Good zoom and shoots a clear image/video - 36 MP camera. Can be used as a conference camera for your laptop or for filming videos to upload. A lot of stuff for a very good price. I bought a different camera last year and one of my kids wanted their own. This one seems to have more filming options with a better monitor for viewing. It was a good deal!! I asked a question prior to purchasing and they responded quickly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great entry level vlogging camera
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for an entry level video camera to start making vlogs and came across this small handycam. Does come with 2 batteries and a stabilizer handle to make an action video which is kind of helpful if you are making videos on a move or gardening project which is what I am going to do. Has an external mic option that provides with crisper sound and has all necessary wires to connect to the camera in the box which is great. The only con I have is that it does not come with a memory card which would be great. The camera quality for video and still images is really good. I will recommend if you are in the market for entry level video camera to start your journey in vlogging or videography.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Nice camera, but it is an illusion
reviews.reviewText: Tried seven different SD cards with this, each one it stated that it was write protected when it was not. Yes, I did try the switch both ways to be sure on every card. SD cards worked fine in my computer and in another video camera. Just this one was right out of the box a No Go! Manual is very poor, does not even explain the remote - which is no big deal but typical of Chinese made equipment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice compact camcorder!
reviews.reviewText: Nice little camcorder for the money! Comes with two rechargeable batteries so you always have a backup, comes with a microphone, remote and attachments as well, can use on its own or with the microphone & attachments…. So far it seems to work well! I’ve used it to video my family’s late Christmas this week and it took great video and audio! Haven’t had the chance to video anything super far away yet but I’m hoping to use it to get some good videos of wildlife, will update after testing the zoom feature out!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A good video camera easy to use
reviews.reviewText: Pros: handy, takes high quality videos and photos, easy to use, I got this for my 9 yr old for him to Railfaning and he can operate it with no problem and it's light weight. Touch screen. Can set up delayed timer.Comes with 2 batteries.Cons: does NOT come with SD card so you have to buy it yourself. Normal size SD card.Charges directly from the camera which is a little inconvenient (as shows in the last photo).Strap is adjustable but it's still too big for us, I had to stitch it to fit.Overall tho I'm satisfied with the product. My son really likes it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic, versatile, camera!
reviews.reviewText: This camera has every feature you could want, and then some. I used to be content with my phone camera, but not after getting this nifty device!The 1080P is great for a camera of this size - I use iMovie to edit my videos and I've had no trouble getting the footage onto iMovie and then eventually processing it for use on YouTube.The remote control of the camera is also extremely useful, especially when I'm filming alone and able to stick the camera on a tripod facing me. The remote can stay in my pocket and be subtly clicked without having to run back to the camera.I will also say that I really appreciate the value provided by the inclusion of such a high quality microphone with the added wind cushion protection. I haven't found any issues recording outdoors and picking up high quality audio from this microphone. It sounds as if I've run it through adobe podcast, without even having to do that! I don't think I'll need any other camera, this one does it all!
